document.docOrigin: Papéis Avulsos de Zoologia (Pap. Avulsos Zool., S. Paulo) 61
document.docTitle: Triplocania miltoni Moura-Lima & Silva-Neto & Bravo & García-Aldrete 2021, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Triplocania Roesler (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Ptiloneuridae): review of the internal classification, new species, and new records for the state of Bahia, Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Triplocania Roesler (Psocodea: ‘ Psocoptera’: Ptiloneuridae): review of the internal classification, new species, and new records for the state of Bahia, Brazil

paragraph.tableNote: * New records from Brazilian state of Bahia.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined:
Holotype male (MZFS). BRAZIL . Bahia . Milagres.
20-29.III.2012
. Leg. Silva-Neto, A.M. & Menezes, E. Light trap
. Paratype : 1 male (MZFS). Same data as the holotype , except (Isla 10285). 13.V.2014 .

Etymology: This species is dedicated to DML’s father, Milton Robson Ribeiro Lima, for guiding him through different life situations, investing in his education, believing in his potential, and encouraging him.
